meta.notes: v1.1.0: Added REQ_TRIGGER_CRITERIA with pattern-based applicability gates to all protocols. Removed Role of Trauma Services.

protocols.name: Traumatic Brain Injury Management
inclusion_criteria: Documented suspected or confirmed traumatic brain injury
Glasgow Coma Scale (GCS) assessed after adequate cardiopulmonary resuscitation
exclusion_criteria: No documented suspected or confirmed head injury
GCS assessment performed prior to adequate cardiopulmonary resuscitation

requirements.description: Applicability gate: suspected or confirmed TBI with documented GCS.
requirements.failure_consequence: NOT_TRIGGERED if no TBI evidence found.

requirements.description: Required data elements present for evaluation and compliance determination.
requirements.failure_consequence: INDETERMINATE if required data elements are missing.

requirements.description: GCS must reflect post-resuscitation neurologic status.
requirements.failure_consequence: NON_COMPLIANT if timing-critical elements not met when applicable.

protocols.name: Rib Fracture Management
inclusion_criteria: Documented rib fracture(s) confirmed on imaging
exclusion_criteria: Documented anatomic or clinical contraindications where risk outweighs benefit

requirements.description: Applicability gate: documented rib fracture(s) on imaging.
requirements.failure_consequence: NOT_TRIGGERED if no rib fracture documented on imaging.

requirements.description: Required data elements present for evaluation and compliance determination.
requirements.failure_consequence: INDETERMINATE if required data elements are missing.

protocols.name: Blunt Abdominal Trauma
inclusion_criteria: Suspected or confirmed blunt mechanism involving the abdomen
exclusion_criteria: No blunt mechanism involving the abdomen
Isolated penetrating abdominal trauma (handled under separate protocol)

requirements.description: Applicability gate: blunt abdominal mechanism documented.
requirements.failure_consequence: NOT_TRIGGERED if no blunt abdominal mechanism documented.

requirements.description: Required data elements present for evaluation and compliance determination.
requirements.failure_consequence: INDETERMINATE if required data elements are missing.

protocols.name: Blunt Chest Trauma
inclusion_criteria: Suspected or confirmed blunt mechanism involving the thorax
exclusion_criteria: No blunt mechanism involving the thorax
Isolated penetrating chest trauma (handled under separate protocol)

requirements.description: Applicability gate: blunt thoracic mechanism documented.
requirements.failure_consequence: NOT_TRIGGERED if no blunt thoracic mechanism documented.

requirements.description: Required data elements present for evaluation and compliance determination.
requirements.failure_consequence: INDETERMINATE if required data elements are missing.

protocols.name: Penetrating Abdominal Trauma
inclusion_criteria: Penetrating injury to the abdomen
exclusion_criteria: No penetrating mechanism involving the abdomen

requirements.description: Applicability gate: penetrating abdominal mechanism documented.
requirements.failure_consequence: NOT_TRIGGERED if no penetrating abdominal mechanism documented.

protocols.name: Penetrating Neck Injury
inclusion_criteria: Penetrating injury to the neck
exclusion_criteria: No penetrating mechanism involving the neck

requirements.description: Applicability gate: penetrating neck mechanism documented.
requirements.failure_consequence: NOT_TRIGGERED if no penetrating neck mechanism documented.

protocols.name: Peripheral Vascular Trauma
inclusion_criteria: Suspected or confirmed peripheral vascular injury

requirements.description: Applicability gate: peripheral vascular injury documented.
requirements.failure_consequence: NOT_TRIGGERED if no vascular injury documented.

protocols.name: Blunt Cerebrovascular Injury (BCVI)
inclusion_criteria: BCVI screening criteria met or confirmed BCVI

requirements.description: Applicability gate: BCVI risk factors or confirmed BCVI.
requirements.failure_consequence: NOT_TRIGGERED if no BCVI risk factors or injury documented.

protocols.name: DVT Prophylaxis – Adult Trauma Patient
inclusion_criteria: All adult trauma patients admitted to the hospital

requirements.description: Applicability gate: admitted adult trauma patient.
requirements.failure_consequence: NOT_TRIGGERED if not a trauma patient.

protocols.name: DVT Prophylaxis – Pediatric Trauma Patient
inclusion_criteria: Pediatric trauma patient (age <= 17)

requirements.description: Applicability gate: pediatric patient (age <= 17).
requirements.failure_consequence: NOT_TRIGGERED if patient age > 17.

protocols.name: Geriatric Trauma Guideline
inclusion_criteria: Trauma patient age >= 65

requirements.description: Applicability gate: geriatric patient (age >= 65).
requirements.failure_consequence: NOT_TRIGGERED if patient age < 65.

protocols.name: Geriatric Hip Fracture Guideline
inclusion_criteria: Geriatric trauma patient with hip fracture
exclusion_criteria: Patient age < 65 or no hip fracture

requirements.description: Applicability gate: geriatric patient (age >= 65) with hip fracture.
requirements.failure_consequence: NOT_TRIGGERED if patient age < 65 or no hip fracture documented.

protocols.name: Screening of the Trauma Patient for Alcohol and/or Drug Use (SBIRT)
inclusion_criteria: All trauma patients

requirements.description: Applicability gate: trauma patient.
requirements.failure_consequence: NOT_TRIGGERED if not a trauma patient.

protocols.name: Mental Health Screening for the Trauma Patient
inclusion_criteria: All trauma patients

requirements.description: Applicability gate: trauma patient.
requirements.failure_consequence: NOT_TRIGGERED if not a trauma patient.

protocols.name: Emergency Resuscitative Thoracotomy
inclusion_criteria: Penetrating trauma with arrest or imminent arrest

requirements.description: Applicability gate: resuscitative thoracotomy performed or criteria met.
requirements.failure_consequence: NOT_TRIGGERED if no thoracotomy criteria documented.

protocols.name: Traumatic Arrest
inclusion_criteria: Traumatic cardiac arrest

requirements.description: Applicability gate: traumatic cardiac arrest documented.
requirements.failure_consequence: NOT_TRIGGERED if no traumatic arrest documented.

protocols.name: Drowning
inclusion_criteria: Drowning or submersion mechanism

requirements.description: Applicability gate: drowning or submersion mechanism documented.
requirements.failure_consequence: NOT_TRIGGERED if no drowning mechanism documented.

protocols.name: Management and Triage of Burned Patients
inclusion_criteria: Burn injury documented

requirements.description: Applicability gate: burn injury documented.
requirements.failure_consequence: NOT_TRIGGERED if no burn injury documented.

protocols.name: Management of Solid Organ Injuries
inclusion_criteria: Solid organ injury documented on imaging

requirements.description: Applicability gate: solid organ injury documented.
requirements.failure_consequence: NOT_TRIGGERED if no solid organ injury documented.

protocols.name: Management of Severe Musculoskeletal Injuries
inclusion_criteria: Severe musculoskeletal injury (open fracture, compartment syndrome, crush, amputation, etc.)
exclusion_criteria: Minor musculoskeletal injury without severity criteria

requirements.description: Applicability gate: severe musculoskeletal injury documented.
requirements.failure_consequence: NOT_TRIGGERED if no severe MSK injury documented.

protocols.name: Management of Neurosurgical Emergencies
inclusion_criteria: Neurosurgical emergency requiring operative intervention or ICP monitoring

requirements.description: Applicability gate: neurosurgical emergency documented.
requirements.failure_consequence: NOT_TRIGGERED if no neurosurgical emergency documented.

protocols.name: Spinal Clearance and Spinal Injury Management
inclusion_criteria: Trauma patient requiring spinal assessment

requirements.description: Applicability gate: spinal injury or clearance assessment documented.
requirements.failure_consequence: NOT_TRIGGERED if no spinal assessment documented.

protocols.name: Management and Stabilization of Pelvic Fractures
inclusion_criteria: Pelvic fracture documented on imaging

requirements.description: Applicability gate: pelvic fracture documented.
requirements.failure_consequence: NOT_TRIGGERED if no pelvic fracture documented.

protocols.name: Management of the Orthopedic/Neurologic Splint and/or Brace
Rib Fracture Management (Extended)
inclusion_criteria: Documented rib fracture(s) confirmed on imaging

requirements.description: Applicability gate: documented rib fracture(s) on imaging.
requirements.failure_consequence: NOT_TRIGGERED if no rib fracture documented on imaging.

protocols.name: Monitoring Base Deficit
inclusion_criteria: Category I trauma patient
OR trauma patient explicitly designated by Trauma Surgeon for shock/resuscitation assessment
exclusion_criteria: Trauma patients who are not Category I and not designated by Trauma Surgeon

requirements.description: Applicability gate: Category I trauma patient.
requirements.failure_consequence: NOT_TRIGGERED if patient is not Category I.

requirements.description: Required data elements present for evaluation and compliance determination.
requirements.failure_consequence: INDETERMINATE if required data elements are missing.

protocols.name: Penetrating Chest Injury
inclusion_criteria: Patient with penetrating injury to the thorax
exclusion_criteria: Penetrating injuries isolated to the abdomen or neck without thoracic involvement

requirements.description: Applicability gate: penetrating thoracic mechanism documented.
requirements.failure_consequence: NOT_TRIGGERED if no penetrating thoracic mechanism documented.

requirements.description: Required data elements present for evaluation and compliance determination.
requirements.failure_consequence: INDETERMINATE if required data elements are missing.

protocols.name: ROTEM Guideline
inclusion_criteria: Trauma patient with Massive Transfusion Protocol (MTP) activation, OR
Trauma patient receiving ED Blood Box or balanced blood resuscitation for ongoing hemorrhage
exclusion_criteria: No MTP activation and no ED Blood Box or balanced blood resuscitation

requirements.description: Applicability gate: MTP activation or ED Blood Box use.
requirements.failure_consequence: NOT_TRIGGERED if no MTP or blood box activation.

protocols.name: Vascular Intervention Guideline
inclusion_criteria: Trauma patient with suspected or confirmed hemorrhage where vascular intervention for hemorrhage control is being considered
exclusion_criteria: No evidence of hemorrhage requiring vascular control

requirements.description: Applicability gate: hemorrhage with vascular intervention consideration.
requirements.failure_consequence: NOT_TRIGGERED if no hemorrhage or vascular intervention criteria met.

protocols.name: Suspected Hanging Guideline
inclusion_criteria: Patient presenting with suspected hanging, defined as intentional or unintentional asphyxiation by ligature or other constricting mechanism around the neck
exclusion_criteria: No history or concern for hanging mechanism
Non-asphyxiation neck injuries without ligature or constricting mechanism

requirements.description: Applicability gate: hanging or strangulation mechanism documented.
requirements.failure_consequence: NOT_TRIGGERED if no hanging mechanism documented.

protocols.name: Blood and Blood Product Transfusion
inclusion_criteria: Trauma patient undergoing active resuscitation for hemorrhage or suspected hemorrhagic shock
Includes all Category I trauma activations
Includes any trauma patient in whom blood product transfusion is initiated or anticipated
exclusion_criteria: Trauma patients without hemorrhage and without transfusion requirement

requirements.description: Applicability gate: hemorrhage, transfusion, or MTP activation.
requirements.failure_consequence: NOT_TRIGGERED if no transfusion or hemorrhage documented.

protocols.name: Hypothermia – Prevention and Treatment
inclusion_criteria: All trauma patients, regardless of injury severity, mechanism, or age

requirements.description: Applicability gate: trauma patient (applies to all trauma patients).
requirements.failure_consequence: NOT_TRIGGERED if not a trauma patient.

protocols.name: Laboratory Studies Needed in Trauma Resuscitation
inclusion_criteria: Trauma patient presenting for initial trauma evaluation or resuscitation
exclusion_criteria: Patients evaluated entirely outside the ED trauma workflow

requirements.description: Applicability gate: trauma patient (applies to all trauma patients).
requirements.failure_consequence: NOT_TRIGGERED if not a trauma patient.

protocols.name: Transfer of the Trauma Patient TO Deaconess Midtown
inclusion_criteria: Trauma patient initially evaluated at an outside facility
Patient sustained a traumatic injury and was transferred to Deaconess Midtown Hospital for definitive trauma care

protocols.name: Transfer of the Trauma Patient FROM Deaconess Midtown
inclusion_criteria: Trauma patient initially evaluated and/or admitted at Deaconess Midtown Hospital
Patient sustained a traumatic injury and was transferred out to an equal or higher level trauma system

protocols.name: Management and Triage of the Obstetrical Trauma Patient
inclusion_criteria: Trauma patient with confirmed pregnancy
Estimated gestational age ≥ 18 weeks

requirements.description: Applicability gate: confirmed pregnancy >= 18 weeks.
requirements.failure_consequence: NOT_TRIGGERED if patient is not pregnant.

protocols.name: Autopsy in the Trauma Patient
inclusion_criteria: Trauma patient death occurring while admitted under the trauma service
exclusion_criteria: Trauma deaths clearly expected and attributable to documented injuries or comorbidities with no diagnostic uncertainty

requirements.description: Applicability gate: trauma patient death documented.
requirements.failure_consequence: NOT_TRIGGERED if patient did not die during admission.

protocols.name: Rehabilitative Services and Discharge Planning for the Trauma Patient
inclusion_criteria: Admitted trauma patient requiring inpatient care

protocols.name: Trauma Surgeon Consult
inclusion_criteria: Injured patient with a traumatic mechanism
Patient does NOT meet Category I or Category II trauma activation criteria

protocols.name: Resuscitation Role Assignments
inclusion_criteria: Activated trauma resuscitation in the Emergency Department

protocols.name: Special Consideration for the Management of the Pediatric Trauma Patient
inclusion_criteria: Trauma patient ≤ 14 years of age

protocols.name: Non-Accidental Trauma (NAT) in the Pediatric Patient
inclusion_criteria: Pediatric trauma patient ≤ 14 years of age
Patient presents with suspected or possible non-accidental trauma (abuse or maltreatment)
exclusion_criteria: Non-trauma presentations without concern for abuse or maltreatment

requirements.description: Applicability gate: pediatric patient (age <= 14).
requirements.failure_consequence: NOT_TRIGGERED if patient age > 14.

protocols.name: Management of Transmediastinal Gunshot Wounds
inclusion_criteria: Trauma patient with penetrating gunshot wound
Trajectory suggests possible transmediastinal involvement
exclusion_criteria: Non-gunshot penetrating mechanisms managed under other protocols

requirements.description: Applicability gate: gunshot wound documented.
requirements.failure_consequence: NOT_TRIGGERED if no gunshot wound documented.
